title: RustKit - ErgoDocs
summary: A SDK for building applications on the Ergo blockchain. Our goal is to create a library that creates a simple and easy to use interface for developers to build applications. Currently, the library is in the early stages of development and is not recommended for production use. crates.io/crates/ergo-rustkit

sections.heading: Rustkit#
sections.content:
A SDK for building applications on the Ergo blockchain. Our goal is to create a library that creates a simple and easy to use interface for developers to build applications. Currently, the library is in the early stages of development and is not recommended for production use.
crates.io/crates/ergo-rustkit
